Trade/Device Name(s): Phamatech QuickScreen™M Pro Multi Drug Screening Test Model 9317T
Phamatech QuickScreen™M Pro Drug Cup Model 9187Z
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Visual color sandwich one step immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Phamatech QuickScreen Barbiturates Test and Multi Drug Screening Test for qualitative detection of barbiturates and multiple drugs in urine using immunoassay technology.
Indications for Use Summary: For rapid, qualitative detection of barbiturates and multiple drugs (amphetamine, cocaine, methamphetamine, opiates, PCP, benzodiazepines, methadone, THC) in urine for professional use as a preliminary screening tool for drug abuse; results require confirmation by alternate methods such as GC/MS.
